text: {"fixed_xml":"<file name=\"line_3.json\"><content><![CDATA[{\n  \"xml_string\": \"<ITEM>20. <BIBL><TITLE>Falckeisische Bibel</TITLE> noch gantz neu in <FORMAT>Schweins-leder</FORMAT> gebunden, \\u221a\\u2020 <PRICE>12. Gulden</PRICE></BIBL>, oder gegen einem neuen <BIBL><TITLE>Corpore Juris</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipziger Edition</PLACE>, zu vertauschen.</ITEM>\"\n}]]></content></file>","number_of_corrections":3,"explanation":"The original XML was not well-formed due to the presence of JSON content and special characters. <file name="line_3.json"><content><![CDATA[{
  "xml_string": "<ITEM>20. <BIBL><TITLE>Falckeisische Bibel</TITLE> noch gantz neu in <FORMAT>Schweins-leder</FORMAT> gebunden, \u221a\u2020 <PRICE>12. Gulden</PRICE></BIBL>, oder gegen einem neuen <BIBL><TITLE>Corpore Juris</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipziger Edition</PLACE>, zu vertauschen.</ITEM>"
}]]></content></file>
parsed.explanation: The original XML was not well-formed due to the presence of JSON content and special characters. To fix this, I added a CDATA section around the JSON content to prevent XML parsing errors. Additionally, I corrected 'PRIZE' to 'PRICE' as it seems to be a more appropriate tag for the given context. The JSON content was wrapped in a 'content' tag to maintain a well-formed XML structure.
